column2: New Age Beverages Corp. engages in the development and commercialization of a portfolio of beverages. The company is headquartered in Aurora, Colorado and currently employs 889 full-time employees. The firm is the owner of XingTea, XingEnergy, Aspen Pure and the Bucha Live Kombucha brands. The firm's bucha Live Kombucha is a gluten free, organic certified, sparkling kombucha tea and is distributed in health and grocery chains across North America. The firm offers its bucha Live Kombucha products in approximately 16-ounce bottle. The firm offers XingTea in approximately 13 flavors. Its product, XINGjuice, is a natural juice drink, made with cane sugar and real fruit juice. Its product, XingEnergy is a naturally flavored cane sugar product. The firm's product, Aspen Pure, is bottled water packaged in approximately 24-ounce, half-liter and one-liter bottles. The firm offers products in approximately 46 states within the United States and in over 10 countries internationally across all channels through direct and store door distribution systems.
